com.burstly.lib.component
Class BurstlyAdaptorListenerWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.BurstlyAdaptorListenerWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBurstlyAdaptorListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAdaptor.AdaptorListenerWrapper
public class BurstlyAdaptorListenerWrapper
extends Object
implements IBurstlyAdaptorListener

Simple wrapper class that delegates calls to underlying object.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii

failedToLoad

public void failedToLoad(String networkName,
                         boolean isInterstitial,
                         String causeOfFailure)
Description copied from interface: IBurstlyAdaptorListener
Should be called when an ad request fails to get a new ad.

Specified by:
failedToLoad in interface IBurstlyAdaptorListener
Parameters:
networkName - String loaded network name. Short name of your network (ex. "mybest")
isInterstitial - boolean defines that current failed ad was interstitial
causeOfFailure - String short cause of failure fetching ad

didLoad

public void didLoad(String networkName,
                    boolean isInterstitial)
Description copied from interface: IBurstlyAdaptorListener
Should be called when a new ad has been received and is about to be displayed.
This method has to be invoked AFTER ad has been fully configured and is ready to be shown.

Specified by:
didLoad in interface IBurstlyAdaptorListener
Parameters:
networkName - String loaded network name. Short name of your network (ex. "mybest").
isInterstitial - boolean defines that current ad is interstitial

Description copied from interface: IBurstlyAdaptorListener
Should be called when adaptor was clicked. Banner and interstitial ad types as well.

Specified by:
adWasClicked in interface IBurstlyAdaptorListener
Parameters:
networkName - String displayed network name
isInterstitial - boolean defines that current ad is interstitial
